name: Slime Fields: Goomastered
description:
[This is the continuing project that originally began as an entry to the GM48 competition in Jan 2020. You can find the itch.io page for that early prototype version of the game here!]

Summary:

In a land of cute, bouncy slimes, what would you do to defend your homeland? Collect and command your forces while you can!

Gameplay:

Hatch and command slimebabies to defend your base from slimemeanies! Click and drag slimes to tell them to go where you'd like. As you defeat more meanies, more slimes will grow to be at your disposal!

Aim for the highest score and compete against your friends with online leaderboards and the ability to create and share custom maps (that are ranked online, too)!

Controls:
  • Move Camera - WASD, Arrows, or Right Mouse Button
  • Zoom Camera - Mouse Scrollwheel, or Page Up/Down
  • Box Select Slimes - Click and Drag on Ground
  • Command Slime - Click and Drag on Slime
  • Ping Slimes - Click on Ground
  • Skip Tutorial - Escape
Notable Features:
  • Procedural Challenges so it stays fresh to replay over and over again.
  • Several Built-In Maps tuned for unique experiences.
  • Custom Map importer so you can customize or create entirely new maps via a simple .png to play on or share a collection with your friends
  • 9 Song Original Soundtrack by:
    • Nynja (Space Dungeon / Suh Burb)
    • Dot Minus (Battle Chef Brigade and Sausage Sports Fest)
  • (New!) Main Menu that integrates all your levels and shows scores  [screenshot]
  • (New!) Online Highscores for all levels, even ones you create and share, yourself!
Other Fun Features:
  • (New!) Several types of enemies [screenshot]
  • (New!) Multi-colored slimes with generated names [screenshot]
  • (New!) Slime consignment around bases to form a solid defense [video]
  • (New!) Slime physicality [video]
